labels.analysis: The MCP Server, "Together Flux Image Generator," is designed for image generation using the Together AI Flux Schnell API. Its core functionality revolves around creating high-quality images, primarily aiding in content creation, application enhancement, or creative tasks. The available tool, "generate-image," facilitates seamless integration of image generation into workflows, indicating its utility in automating or enhancing visual content production.
labels.reasoning: The primary label, "Content Creation," was chosen as the server's main purpose is to enable image generation, a key aspect of content creation. The secondary label "AI/ML Tools" was added because the server leverages AI (specifically, the Together AI Flux model) to generate images. It doesn't fit neatly into other predefined categories, so no custom label is needed.

server_info_crawled.overview: Generate images seamlessly using the Together AI Flux Schnell image API. Enhance your applications with high-quality image creation capabilities powered by Together AI. Easily integrate image generation into your workflows with this MCP server.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@togethercomputer/together-flux-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
